title: Bad Liar
lyrics: I was walking down the street the other day Tryna play it coy In my room there's a king size space Even if it's in my dreams Ooh you're taking all perfection out my mind Ooooh every time I watch you serpentine Oh I'm tryin', I'm tryin', I'm tryin' Not to think about you Oh I'm tryin', I'm tryin', I'm tryin' Not to give in to you I see how your attention builds What could possibly happen next? Ooh you're taking all perfection out my mind Ooooh every time I watch you serpentine Oh I'm tryin', I'm tryin', I'm tryin' Not to think about you Oh I'm tryin', I'm tryin', I'm tryin' Not to give in to you And oh baby let's make reality, actuality, a reality Oh baby let's make reality, actuality, a reality Oh I'm tryin', I'm tryin', I'm tryin' Not to think about you Oh I'm tryin', I'm tryin', I'm tryin' Not to give in to you
